paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study comparing tumor and germline testing in patients with epithelial ovarian cancer.

individual_records.phenotype_details: germline mutation detected only upon resequencing with newly extracted tumor DNA.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the third case with a BRCA2 frameshift mutation (c.8537_8538delAG p.(Glu2846fs)), only resequencing with newly extracted tumor DNA detected the germline mutation.

functional_data.summary: The mutation was not identified in the primary tumor sequencing but was detected upon resequencing.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was missed in initial tumor testing.
key_quotes: In the third case with a BRCA2 frameshift mutation (c.8537_8538delAG p.(Glu2846fs)), only resequencing with newly extracted tumor DNA detected the germline mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
